gpt_researcher.scraper.arxiv.arxiv.ArxivScraper.scrape ( self)
The function scrapes relevant documents from Arxiv based on a given link and returns the content of the first document.
Returns: The code is returning the page content of the first document retrieved by the ArxivRetriever for a given query extracted from the link.
